name: Stick with string
description: Literally just a branch with a string tied to the end — not too effective.

name: Sting with a hook
description: Cheap and ineffective fishing method. Doesn't really provide anything apart from the most basic entry to fishing

name: Ruined Angler
description: Old and battered this rod hasn't got long left

name: Bronze Head Spear
description: A fishing spear with a hammered bronze head, should impoved durablitiy

name: Iron Head Spear
description: Best fising spear money can buy, some people claim it's a waste of weapon grade iron
